attributes.action: Close down chat-avenue.com in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Chat-Avenue.com and other unregistered chat sites should be shut down.

They are dangerous to people of all ages especially kids and young adults.

Anyone can go in to any of the rooms and say they are any age. The kids/teen rooms seem to be used by those looking to prey on young children for sex and grooming talks.

The rooms are meant to be moderated but they can not be there all the time and are not 100% effective when they are their. Some of the rooms have open web cams for public viewing and anyone can go in and view and come across obscene sights.

The kids and teen rooms seem to be full over people to old or too young to be there.

The site is a danger to all those who go in to them.
